quality_scores.overall_assessment: The extraction process captured some glazing-specific content, but there were notable gaps in relevance and completeness. While the images and tables provided some useful glazing details, the text summary was not focused on glazing-specific information. Reference alignment was relatively strong for images but weaker for text and tables. Improvements in parameter tuning are needed to enhance precision and reduce irrelevant content.

reasoning: Increasing the confidence_threshold to 0.4 will help filter out low-confidence items, improving precision. Raising the content_classification_threshold to 0.3 will reduce irrelevant content in text summaries. Reducing skip_pages to 2 ensures more pages are processed, potentially capturing missed glazing data. Increasing image_size_min to 150 will focus on higher-quality images, reducing noise. Raising max_extractions to 20 allows for capturing additional relevant items, especially if more glazing-specific content is present in the document.
